name: Humantic AI
natural_language_description: 这是 Humantic AI 节点。主要用于: Consume Humantic AI API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: profile

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create

userId.name: userId
userId.description: This value is the same as the User ID that was provided when the analysis was created. Currently only supported for profiles created using LinkedIn URL.
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: This value is the same as the User ID that was provided when the analysis was created. Currently only supported for profiles created using LinkedIn URL. | (必填项)

sendResume.name: sendResume
sendResume.description: Whether to send a resume for a resume of the user
sendResume.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Resume | 作用: Whether to send a resume for a resume of the user | 默认值: False

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the resume in PDF or DOCX format | 默认值: data

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: persona (值: None) - Fetch the Humantic profile of the user for a particular persona type. Multiple persona values can be supported using comma as a delimiter.

text.name: text
text.description: Additional text written by the user
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: Additional text written by the user
